newsitem.title: USA: Kansas fed cattle trade fairly active $63 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas fed cattle trade fairly active $63 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was fairly active, with slaughter steers and heifers $1.00 per cwt lower than last week, USDA said.
Inquiry moderate, demand light. Sales confirmed on 11,200 slaughter steers and 14,700 slaughter heifers Tuesday.
For the week to date 40,000 head confirmed inlcuding 15,800 head or about 39 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1170-1300 lbs 63.00. Dressed Basis - Select and Choice 2-3 1200-1300 lbs 102.00.

Slaughter heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1025-1150 lbs 63.00, few Select with end Choice 62.00-62.50; mixed Commercial to Choice 1000-1150 lb heifers and heiferettes 60.00-63.00. Confirmed - 25,900 last week - 2,000 last year - 47,200
Wk to date - 40,000 last week - 11,500 last year - 67,100
